page.title: 01Our Area : Intro.
page.content: Our "block" lies between the relatively industrial towns of the west coast of Cumbria and the Lake District National Park. The nearest towns are Whitehaven and Workington some five or six miles to the west, the nearest lakes being Loweswater and Ennerdale roughly three miles to the east. The school that has undertaken this survey is only just out of the area as the village of Arlecdon is divided by the southerly grid line. Subsequently less than half of the village and its amenities are not evident but would be included in the grid block: 03040516 Consequently it will be seen that our area is essentially very rural.
